name: Victor UX4XR
description:
When a traditional third person game gets ported to Vr there's unconventional cutscenes and design flaws, In this apk there's a showcase of the issue and how to improve high action VR motion cutscene, when they're poorly ported to vr. 

For the full experience and improvable examples try the apk,

otherwise heres the shapesxr s5rx3ed7 and link 

https://shapes.app/space/view/2b2e34f6-8e96-4073-8ebe-f0339eb6509b/s5rx3ed7
